overview.base: You can hear all moving creatures within 30 feet. If the creature is breathing, you can hear it even if it is not moving. You can not detect @L[Condition:Silent]{silent} creatures in this way.

You can passively smell the types of all living creatures within 30 feet. You can detect dead and undead creatures as well, but you cannot distinguish within or between them. They all smell like death. You also gain @L[Ability:Scent Seeing]{Scent Seeing}. You can not detect @L[Condition:Odorless]{odorless} creatures in this way.

You know the exact location of all target creatures. You continue to know the location of all targets within 10 feet, whether they are or you are moving or not, so long as they are still within 10 feet of you.

system.requirements: You are not @L[Condition:Anosmatic]{anosmatic} and the target is not @L[Condition:Odorless]{odorless}.

overview.base: Your @L[Equipment:Mouth]{mouth} counts as a @L[Category:Weapons]{weapon} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with it and its damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Shields]{shields} for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Block Interaction]{block} with them and their @L[Core:Block Value]{BV} is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands @L[Property:Blocking]{blocking}.
As you attack, choose either arm or leg. The damage gets dealt accordingly.

results.hit: The target takes 1 @L[Damage:Hack]{hack damage} on either an arm or leg, depending on what you chose.
results.critHit: The target takes 2 @L[Damage:Hack]{hack damage} on either arms or legs, depending on what you chose.

overview.base: You become @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}. As you do this, you may roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk]]. If this is greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak} ([[/roll 10 + @snk]]), then you use it as your hidden DC. If not, use your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}.
overview.proficient: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @p]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}).
overview.fluent: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @f]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}).

system.requirements: You are in a location with shadows, dim light, @L[Core:Cover]{three-quarters cover}, or some other feature which the @L[Core:GM]{GM} determines is appropriate for being @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}. You must remain in areas that maintain these conditions to stay @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}.

results.critHit: If you want, target takes @L[Core:Damage]{standard damage} as well.

overview.base: You cannot use items in your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands}.

You crawl at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed} and can @L[Ability:Move]{Move} at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed} speed while @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}. Additionally, @L[Category:Movement effects]{movement effects} only require a DC 10 @L[Core:SNK]{SNK} @L[Core:Feat Interaction]{feat save} to keep from breaking your @L[Condition:Hidden]{hiding}.
overview.proficient: You crawl at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{full speed} and can @L[Ability:Move]{Move} at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{full speed} while @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}.

results.hit: Target takes a @L[Damage:Hack]{vitals hack} of your choice.
results.critHit: If you want, target takes @L[Core:Damage]{standard damage} as well.
